cfca.util
Class EnvelopeUtil

java.lang.Object
  cfca.util.EnvelopeUtil

public class EnvelopeUtil
extends java.lang.Object

EnvelopeUtil class provides static method for digital envelope corresponding operations.

Envelope message source data

Parameters:
sourceData -
